description: This file defines the `MenuProvider` class, a ChangeNotifier subclass managing menu data, filtering, and featured items for a restaurant frontend app. It includes methods for loading mock data, filtering menu items based on category and search query, and communicates state changes via notifyListeners().

classes.name: MenuProvider
classes.description: A class extending ChangeNotifier that manages menu items, categories, filtering state, and featured items for a restaurant app.

methods.name: loadMock
methods.description: Loads mock menu data into the provider and notifies listeners.

methods.name: activeCategory
methods.description: Getter and setter for the active category filter.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Getter and setter for the search query used in filtering menu items.

methods.name: categories
methods.description: Returns the list of menu categories from mock data.

methods.name: featured
methods.description: Returns a list of menu items marked as featured.

methods.name: filtered
methods.description: Returns a list of menu items filtered by active category and search query.
